## 🧭 Objective: 
Compare reconstruction approaches across different historical contexts.
## ✍️ Prompt: 
Which strategies yield the most consistent recovery? Are there regional patterns?

## 📥 Load Data
```{r}
recovery <- read_csv("assets/datasets/reconstruction_strategies.csv")
recovery %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = strategy, y = recovery_score, fill = region)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Effectiveness of Reconstruction Strategies",
       x = "Strategy Type", y = "Recovery Score") +
  theme_minimal()
```
